entities.name: ludo
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is described as the most noticeable person Harry has seen so far. He is wearing a long Quidditch robe with bright yellow and black stripes, an enormous picture of a wasp on his chest, and has a large belly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as seeing Ludo Bagman for the first time. He notices that Ludo's robe is stretched tightly across his large belly.

relationships.description: Ludo greets Harry with 'Aha! The man of the moment! Ludo!'
Harry notices Ludo, indicating that Ludo has drawn his attention.
